Summary: Gray circle followed by two small lights.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was looking towards the southeast. When out of the corner of my eye I sawsomething. It was gray circle it was moving northwest. It move behind abuilding.. I try to find it again but could not . A minute and a half later Isaw two lights close together coming from the same direction going towards thediction of the first object. There was no noise from any of the objects. Itfairly clear.
